column1: Santa Lucía (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈsanta luˈsi.a]) is a city in the Canelones Department of southern Uruguay.
Santa Lucía is also the name of the municipality to which the city belongs.
The city is located on the intersection of Route 11 with Route 63
